Hello There

I am a Software Engineer with a background in hospitality. I have excellent team work skills and a passion for solving problems both big and small. I naturally gravitate towards keystone positions and have a supportive leadership style which is my greatest strength in a team environment. This stems from the idea that we fail and succeed together, and we are our best selves when we help each other.
